author: Omar Rashid
text:
Holding them directly responsible for the suicide of Dalit scholar Rohith Vemula, the Bahujan Samaj Party on Tuesday demanded the sacking of Union Ministers Smriti Irani and Bandaru Dattatreya. The party demanded that P. Appa Rao, Vice-Chancellor of the University of Hyderabad, be booked for murder under Section 302 IPC.

“Smriti Irani and Bandaru Dattatreya should step down taking moral responsibility. If not, Prime Minister Narendra Modi should ask for their resignations. They are as big culprits as the VC,” Swami Prasad Maurya, senior BSP leader, told The Hindu .

The party holds them responsible for the suicide of Dalit scholar
title: Remove Smriti, Dattatreya: BSP
